languages.text: "Да. Скверна мутаций редко оставляет человека в ясном рассудке, но то, что нес безумец на эшафоте — и что он с собой сделал — выходит за любые рамки".

traits.locale_text: "Согласен. Хотя безумие и способно принять любую форму — возникает оно не на пустом месте. И эта мания присвоения чужой жизни... Почитать бы его "Хронику Судеб".

languages.text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."
languages.original_text: "Да. Скверна мутаций редко оставляет человека в ясном рассудке, но то, что нес безумец на эшафоте — и что он с собой сделал — выходит за любые рамки".

"Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

languages.text: "Ja. Mutationen sind eine Verderbnis, die nahezu immer auch den Verstand in Mitleidenschaft zieht. Was der Wahnsinnige aber auf dem Schafott gerufen und sich selbst angetan hat, war jenseits von Gut und Böse."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

traits.locale_text: "Ja. Mutationen sind eine Verderbnis, die nahezu immer auch den Verstand in Mitleidenschaft zieht. Was der Wahnsinnige aber auf dem Schafott gerufen und sich selbst angetan hat, war jenseits von Gut und Böse."

languages.text: « En effet. La mutation est une corruption qui fait généralement sombrer la victime dans la démence, mais les élucubrations et les actes de ce fou sur la potence dépassent les bornes. »
languages.original_text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. La mutation est une corruption qui fait généralement sombrer la victime dans la démence, mais les élucubrations et les actes de ce fou sur la potence dépassent les bornes. »

languages.text: 「そうです。変異は精神の健全さをほとんど残さぬほど堕落します。あの狂人が晒し台で口にしたこと、そして自分自身に施したことは、常軌を逸していました」
languages.original_text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

traits.locale_text: 「そうです。変異は精神の健全さをほとんど残さぬほど堕落します。あの狂人が晒し台で口にしたこと、そして自分自身に施したことは、常軌を逸していました」

languages.text: «Así es. La mutación es una corrupción que rara vez deja a sus víctimas con la mente sana, pero lo que ese lunático vociferó en el patíbulo y lo que se había hecho va mucho más allá».
languages.original_text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. La mutación es una corrupción que rara vez deja a sus víctimas con la mente sana, pero lo que ese lunático vociferó en el patíbulo y lo que se había hecho va mucho más allá».

languages.text: “一点都没错。变异本身是一种腐化，遭到腐化的人很少能保持头脑清醒，但那个疯子在行刑台上发表的言论，还有他对自己做的事情，已经完全超出了变异的范围。”
languages.original_text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错。变异本身是一种腐化，遭到腐化的人很少能保持头脑清醒，但那个疯子在行刑台上发表的言论，还有他对自己做的事情，已经完全超出了变异的范围。”

languages.text: "Evet. Mutasyon, musallat olduğu insanın akli sağlığını muhakkak bozar ama o delinin darağacında dedikleriyle kendisine yaptıklarının açıklanacak hiçbir yanı yok."
languages.original_text: "Yes. Mutation is a corruption that seldom leaves a person with a sound mind, but what the madman spouted on the scaffold, and what he had done to himself, was beyond the pale."

traits.locale_text: "Evet. Mutasyon, musallat olduğu insanın akli sağlığını muhakkak bozar ama o delinin darağacında dedikleriyle kendisine yaptıklarının açıklanacak hiçbir yanı yok."
